Posts.Content: Madge, Did they test your tumor for HER2pos? Tina
Posts.Title: Metastatic Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: I had terrible bone pain with Arimidex, and weight gain. Now I am on Aromasin. It has only been a week, so I don;t know yet how it will be. But getting of the Arimidex was great.
Posts.Title: Aromasin

Posts.Content: Madge, I will pray you keep getting better! I don't know much, but my doc put me on Aromasin. I heard it is stronger than Femora. I think if I were you I would switch to Aromasin. Keep up the good fight. Tina
Posts.Title: Metastatic Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: I had this test done. Thank goodness I had neither gene. Now I do not worry about my two daughters, my mom and my sister. I cried when I found out both were negative. I had my test done through Grant Hospital in Columbus. It is something I think every women should have as a preventative measure. Did you end up doing the test? Tina
Posts.Title: Genetic Testing - Brca 1 & 2....questions?

Posts.Content: I had stage 2 with 6 positive nodes. I went through chemo and radiation. I took tamoxifen and arimidex and had to stop both because of side effects. Some ladies don't have any trouble with them, but I did. The tamoxifen caused shortness of breath, rapid heart beat, minor hair loss and joint pain. I took it about 18 mos. then tried arimidex . After a couple months, Arimidex caused stiffness and joint pain and my oncologist told me I had fibromyalgia from it. I couldn't take it any more. He took me off it, and now I am trying aromasin. I've only taken it a week, but it is causing moderate dizziness. I will be a 4 yr survivor in May, so I hope I don't have to take the meds too much longer. I hope you don't have side effects. Just because I did, doesn't mean you will. These meds are helping women survive breast cancer, so that is a good thing. God bless you! Tina
Posts.Title: After Chemo & Radiation
